Class AntHive

  • java.lang.Object
    • antsimulator.gameObjects.AntHive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable

    public class AntHive
extends Object
implements org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
    Represents a single ant hive.
    Author:
    Ville-Matti Tanninen

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_VECTOR

        protected static final org.jsfml.system.Vector2i NULL_VECTOR
        Used when checking if the texture has already been loaded. The size of an empty texture is equal to NULL_VECTOR
